Select an NFT collection for each cell using the clues that correspond to that cells rows and columns.
Collections in the drop down are ordered by all-time sales volume and they must be exact.
Each game, you have nine guesses to fill out the grid.
Each NFT collection, whether correct or incorrect, will count as one of your nine guesses.
If an image pops up, congratulations -- you got it right you little degen.
A collection cannot be used twice.
If a clue is a trait, it will count whether the trait is the category or value.
